stories.Title: Google presents AI Studio
stories.Description: Google is offering developers the full power of Gemini through AI Studio. This web-based tool enables them to develop Gemini-based chatbots and prompts for their apps.
stories.Tweet: Google presents AI Studio 📦 Google is offering developers the full power of Gemini through AI Studio. This web-based tool enables them to develop Gemini-based chatbots and prompts for their apps. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/12/13/with-ai-studio-google-launches-an-easy-to-use-tool-for-developing-apps-and-chatbots-based-on-its-gemini-model/

stories.Title: AI for medical workers
stories.Description: As part of its efforts to improve healthcare, Google has unveiled MedLM—a series of specialized AI models trained on medical data designed to optimize workflows and enhance doctor-patient interactions.
stories.Tweet: AI for medical workers 📦 As part of its efforts to improve healthcare, Google has unveiled MedLM—a series of specialized AI models trained on medical data designed to optimize workflows and enhance doctor-patient interactions. #ai https://www.cnbc.com/2023/12/13/how-doctors-are-using-googles-new-ai-models-for-health-care.html

stories.Title: Introducing: Phi-2
stories.Description: Rushing to stay ahead of competitors in the AI industry, Microsoft Research has unveiled Phi-2, a compact language model that can easily run on laptops and mobile devices, surpassing Gemini Nano 2.
stories.Tweet: Introducing: Phi-2 📦 Rushing to stay ahead of competitors in the AI industry, Microsoft Research has unveiled Phi-2, a compact language model that can easily run on laptops and mobile devices, surpassing Gemini Nano 2. #microsoft https://venturebeat.com/ai/microsoft-releases-phi-2-a-small-language-model-ai-that-outperforms-llama-2-mistral-7b/

stories.Title: The best of the best
stories.Description: In the pursuit of valuable data for model training, OpenAI partners with media giant Axel Springer, aiming to improve ChatGPT's user experience with content from renowned publications.
stories.Tweet: The best of the best 📦 In the pursuit of valuable data for model training, OpenAI partners with media giant Axel Springer, aiming to improve ChatGPT's user experience with content from renowned publications. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/openai-partners-with-politico-business-insider-publisher-axel-springer-to-surface-and-train-on-news-content/

stories.Title: Put your glasses on
stories.Description: If you're one of the owners of Meta's Ray-Ban smart glasses, a lot of upgrades are coming your way—from fashion suggestions to real-time translation. AI makes it happen. Just say, "Hey, Meta!"
stories.Tweet: Put your glasses on 📦 If you're one of the owners of Meta's Ray-Ban smart glasses, a lot of upgrades are coming your way—from fashion suggestions to real-time translation. AI makes it happen. Just say, "Hey, Meta!" #meta https://www.theverge.com/2023/12/12/23998780/ray-ban-smart-glasses-hey-meta-multimodal-ai-features

stories.Title: Be the judge
stories.Description: AI keeps making strides in various disciplines, including the once-controversial field of law. The UK Judicial Office now allows judges to use ChatGPT and other tools for legal tasks.
stories.Tweet: Be the judge 📦 AI keeps making strides in various disciplines, including the once-controversial field of law. The UK Judicial Office now allows judges to use ChatGPT and other tools for legal tasks. #ai https://gizmodo.com/uk-judges-now-permitted-use-chatgpt-in-legal-rulings-1851093046

stories.Title: Ready for the dancefloor
stories.Description: Tesla's Optimus is back with new capabilities! The second-gen humanoid robot stuns in recent footage with improved mobility, advanced manipulation, and even a surprise dance number.
stories.Tweet: Ready for the dancefloor 📦 Tesla's Optimus is back with new capabilities! The second-gen humanoid robot stuns in recent footage with improved mobility, advanced manipulation, and even a surprise dance number. #tesla https://www.engadget.com/teslas-latest-optimus-robot-can-handle-an-egg-without-breaking-it-154610781.html

stories.Title: Shooting through the skies
stories.Description: After a significant setback last year, Blue Origin is ready to break its long hiatus with the launch of the New Shepard suborbital vehicle on December 18, carrying 33 experiments aboard.
stories.Tweet: Shooting through the skies 📦 After a significant setback last year, Blue Origin is ready to break its long hiatus with the launch of the New Shepard suborbital vehicle on December 18, carrying 33 experiments aboard. #blueorigin https://spacenews.com/blue-origin-to-resume-new-shepard-suborbital-launches/

stories.Title: Just another delay
stories.Description: SpaceX's Falcon Heavy launch for the U.S. Space Force is currently facing several delays due to bad weather and ground issues. Will the top-secret mission reach the skies soon? We have yet to see.
stories.Tweet: Just another delay 📦 SpaceX's Falcon Heavy launch for the U.S. Space Force is currently facing several delays due to bad weather and ground issues. Will the top-secret mission reach the skies soon? We have yet to see. #spacex https://www.digitaltrends.com/space/spacex-calls-off-falcon-heavy-launch-for-third-day-in-a-row/

stories.Title: Is better electric
stories.Description: A renowned classic is embracing its electric era as Land Rover unveils a sneak peek of the Range Rover Electric, featuring an 800-volt architecture and retaining the capabilities we already love.
stories.Tweet: Is better electric 📦 A renowned classic is embracing its electric era as Land Rover unveils a sneak peek of the Range Rover Electric, featuring an 800-volt architecture and retaining the capabilities we already love. #rangerover https://www.engadget.com/range-rover-electric-teased-ahead-of-its-2024-reveal-111741916.html

title: Google unveils AI Studio, Optimus keeps moving, Meta's fashionable glasses
description: Hey developers, good news – now you can dive into all the cool stuff Gemini has to offer with Google's AI Studio, a handy tool to craft Gemini-infused chatbots for any app. There is much anticipation as Tesla introduces the next Optimus. Spoiler: it's got better dance moves than me! And, if you're stuck on what to wear to that fancy dinner party, Meta’s smart glasses got your back with some style suggestions.
